Contribution Guidelines

ğŸ’» Code Contributions

1.

Fork & Clone

Fork the repository and clone it to your local machine

2.

Create a Branch

Create a feature branch for your changes

3.

Write & Test

Write your code and ensure tests pass

4.

Submit PR

Submit a pull request with a clear description

ğŸ“‹ Code Standards

Follow Python PEP 8

Maintain consistent code style

Write Clear Comments

Document your code in English

Add Tests

Include tests for new features

Update Documentation

Keep README and docs current

What makes our community special

Inclusivity

We welcome developers from all backgrounds, skill levels, and experiences. Diversity makes our community stronger and our solutions better.

ğŸ“

Continuous Learning

We believe in learning together. Share knowledge, ask questions, and help others grow. Every interaction is an opportunity to learn something new.

âœ¨

Quality & Delight

We strive for excellence in everything we do. Quality code, thoughtful design, and delightful user experiences are at the heart of our work.
